package logical

// Generated by msgen. DO NOT EDIT.

import(
	"context"
	"some/service/ops"
)

type client struct {
	backends ops.Backends
}

func New(b ops.Backends) *client {

	return &client{
		backends: b,
	}
}

func (c *client) Ping(
	ctx context.Context,
	int64Value int64,
	stringValue string,
) error {

	return ops.Ping(
		ctx,
		c.backends,
		int64Value,
		stringValue,
	)
}

func (c *client) Pong(
	ctx context.Context,
) (int64, string, error) {

	return ops.Pong(
		ctx,
		c.backends,
	)
}
